review: It works well for the most part. I think the companion app UI interaction is not initiative. With no buttons it relies on a the spacial relationship of the screen and the blank touch area on the app for control. It would be better to have some indicator in the app on what you are clicking.

review: I bought this as a gift for my mom, because she loves watching Netflix but doesn't have a smart TV. This little gadget hooked up to her TV fast and easily, and she was able to start watching movies that night. This is an excellent gift for parents who are getting up there in age, since it's easy to use and easy to hook up. Would definitely buy again.
